•	 fl;lzq;fs; midj;Jk; ,yq;if &ghapy; nfhLf;fg;gl;Ls;sd.
•	 mjpNtf mQ;ry;Nrit (EMS)> thd;top nghjp mQ;ry;> ry; (SAL) nghjp mQ;ry; kw;Wk; fly;top nghjp mQ;ry;; 
NritfSf;fhd Mff;$ba epiwahdJ gazKbT ehLfSf;fika NtWgLk;.
